Class SubnetChecker

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.utils.SubnetChecker
public final class SubnetChecker extends Object
SubnetChecker is a "static utility" class that identifies which subnet the Iris client is running on using a configurable series of TCP and/or ICMP pings. SubnetChecker's background ping-thread is started by a static initialization-block at the very end of the class.
Author:
John L. Stanley - SRF Consulting

    • start

      public static void start()
      Start the SubnetChecker. This method can be called immediately after the client-side system_properties cache is loaded to minimize the small delay between first referencing this class and the class reporting the correct subnet.
